title: The Edwardians
resume: It was a time when England was a nation on the cusp of change, an evolving landscape tht lay between Victorian England and the First World War. 'The Edwardians' explores the lives of and events in the lives of many who helped define the era, the "Belle Epoque".

'The Edwardians' explores the lives of and events in the lives of many who helped define the era, the "Belle Epoque".
